content: धीरता {@--1@} Fortitude, courage, strength of mind; विपत्तौ च महाल्ँलोके धीरतामनुगच्छति <ls>H. 3. 44</ls>; <ls>V. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Suppression of jealousy &c. {@--3@} Gravity, solemnity (as shown by silence &c.); प्रत्यादेशान्न खलु भवतो धीरतां कल्पयामि <ls>Me. 114.</ls> {@--4@} Steadiness, firmness. {@--5@} Wisdom, cleverness. {@--6@} Refusal. (For other meanings see धैर्य).
